snippet: Jean Carlo Pena was accused of loading automated teller machines at two Chase branches in Manhattan with crude counterfeits of bills and stealing $78,000 from them.
lead_paragraph: Jean Carlo Pena was accused of loading automated teller machines at two Chase branches in Manhattan with crude counterfeits of bills and stealing $78,000 from them.

headline.seo: Suspect Arrested in Counterfeiting and Theft From A.T.M.’s
headline.main: Suspect Arrested in Counterfeiting and Theft From A.T.M.’s
headline.print_headline: Suspect Arrested in Theft From A.T.M.’s and Counterfeiting
